UPDATE data_plans SET data_limit = CASE WHEN plan_name = 'Basic' THEN 1000 WHEN plan_name = 'Premium' THEN 5000 ELSE data_limit END, price = CASE WHEN plan_name = 'Basic' THEN 9.99 WHEN plan_name = 'Premium' THEN 19.99 ELSE price END;
UPDATE personalized_plans SET personalized_price = CASE WHEN user_id = 1 THEN 15.99 WHEN user_id = 2 THEN 14.99 ELSE personalized_price END WHERE plan_id = 1;
